item.title: 印度九月份贸易逆差缩小，进口额下降
item.description: 由于印度控制了进口支出，该国 9 月份的贸易赤字降至四个月以来的最低点。【原文：India’s trade deficit narrowed to the lowest in four-months in September as the nation reined in its import bill.】

item.title: SAP 取代 ASML 成为欧洲最有价值技术公司
item.description: ASML Holding NV 的指导性削减导致这家荷兰芯片设备制造商的股价暴跌，使其欧洲最有价值技术公司的地位被软件公司 SAP SE 取代。【原文：ASML Holding NV lost its place as Europe’s most valuable technology company to software firm SAP SE after a guidance cut sent the Dutch chip-machine maker’s shares plunging.】

item.title: 泰铢波动，比索在降息后步履维艰
item.description: 泰国央行四年多来首次降息，令投资者大吃一惊，泰铢随之波动。菲律宾中央银行（Bangko Sentral ng Pilipinas）如期降息后，菲律宾比索变化不大。【原文：Thailand’s baht flip-flopped after the nation’s central bank surprised investors with its first interest rate cut in more than four years. The Philippine peso was little changed after Bangko Sentral ng Pilipinas delivered an expected rate reduction.】

item.title: 高盛沙特阿拉伯首席执行官在任职十年后将离职
item.description: 熟悉内情的人士透露，高盛集团（Goldman Sachs Group Inc.【原文：Goldman Sachs Group Inc.’s top executive in Saudi Arabia is set to leave the bank after nearly a decade running its operations in the Middle East’s biggest economy, people familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: 香港寻求深化作为离岸人民币交易中心的角色
item.description: 香港正在寻求进一步发展其作为人民币和中国债券离岸中心的作用。【原文：Hong Kong is seeking to further develop its role as an offshore center for the yuan and Chinese bonds.】

item.title: 面对中国威胁，欧洲航空公司压力陡增
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，法航荷航正在游说法国政府限制中国大陆航空公司飞往欧洲的航班数量，以保护欧洲航空公司免受不公平竞争。【原文：Air-France KLM is lobbying the French government to cap the number of flights that mainland Chinese carriers can make to Europe, according to people familiar with the matter, in a bid to protect European airlines from unfair competition.】

item.title: 印尼盾承压后印尼央行维持关键利率不变
item.description: 由于外部风险拖累印尼盾，印尼央行一如预期维持关键利率稳定，暂停了宽松周期。【原文：Indonesia’s central bank kept its key interest rate steady as expected, pausing an easing cycle as external risks drag on the rupiah currency.】

item.title: 马斯克的 "星链 "计划获胜，印度拒绝安巴尼和米塔尔的频谱拍卖计划
item.description: 埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）的星链公司（Starlink Inc）在印度卫星宽带市场的争夺战中取得了一场胜利，政府部长表示将分配频谱，而不是像本土亿万富翁穆克什-安巴尼（Mukesh Ambani）和苏尼尔-米塔尔（Sunil Mittal）所寻求的那样进行拍卖。【原文：Elon Musk’s Starlink Inc. has logged a win in the fight for India’s satellite broadband market with a government minister saying the spectrum will be allocated, and not auctioned as sought by homegrown billionaires Mukesh Ambani and Sunil Mittal.】

item.title: LVMH 销售额下滑加剧 ASML 订单阴霾，欧洲股市下跌
item.description: 受法国奢侈品巨头路威酩轩集团（LVMH）销售额意外下滑拖累，欧洲股市周三进一步下跌，而此前荷兰芯片设备制造商 ASML Holding NV 的业绩展望也令人震惊。【原文：European stocks fell further on Wednesday, dragged down by an unexpected drop in sales of French luxury behemoth LVMH, which followed a shock outlook from Dutch chip-equipment maker ASML Holding NV.】

item.title: Rekeep 正就出售能源部门以解决债务问题进行独家谈判
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，意大利管理服务公司 Rekeep SpA 正在进行独家谈判，拟将其能源部门出售给效率平台 Renovit SpA 和公用事业公司 Hera SpA，以寻求资金解决到期债务问题。【原文：Italian management services company Rekeep SpA is in exclusive talks to sell its energy arm to efficiency platform Renovit SpA and utility firm Hera SpA as it seeks funds to address maturing debt, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 菲律宾第二次下调关键利率，物价涨势放缓
item.description: 菲律宾中央银行今年第二次将基准利率下调 25 个基点，因为通胀放缓为其提供了进一步宽松的空间。【原文：The Philippine central bank cut its benchmark interest rate by 25 basis points for the second time this year, as slowing inflation gave it room for further easing.】

item.title: 亚马逊将在印度 Prime Video 上播放广告以资助投资
item.description: 随着母公司亚马逊公司（Amazon.com Inc. 致力于为这个快速增长且竞争激烈的市场提供内容投资资金，从明年开始，印度 Prime Video 流媒体平台的观众将不得不忍受节目和电影播放过程中的广告干扰。【原文：Viewers of Prime Video streaming platform in India will have to brace for interruptions from advertisements during shows and movies starting next year as parent Amazon.com Inc. seeks to fund content investments in a fast growing and fiercely competitive market.】

item.title: 美国需求疲软，第三季度 Just Eat 外卖订单下降
item.description: Just Eat Takeaway.com NV 报告称，由于北美地区对在线食品外卖的需求依然疲软，第三季度订单量有所下降。【原文：Just Eat Takeaway.com NV reported a decline in orders for the third quarter as demand for online food delivery in North America remained weak.】

item.title: 英镑两个月来首次跌破 1.30 美元
item.description: 在英国通胀数据低于预期之后，英镑跌破了 1.30 美元，这让投资者更加大胆地押注英国央行会更积极地降息。【原文：The pound fell below $1.30 after UK inflation data came in softer-than-expected, emboldening investors to bet on more aggressive Bank of England rate cuts.】

item.title: 香港施政报告的赢家和输家在这里
item.description: 随着政府放宽按揭规定并扩大吸引富裕移民的计划，香港的房地产开发商、经纪公司和零售商将从行政长官的施政报告中获益。【原文：Hong Kong’s property developers, brokerages and retailers are poised to benefit from the chief executive’s policy address as the government relaxes mortgage rules and expands a plan to attract wealthy immigrants.】

item.title: 液化天然气需求增加，欧洲天然气价格走高
item.description: 欧洲天然气价格走高，原因是海运燃料需求在今年早些时候下降后有所回升。【原文：European natural gas prices moved higher as demand for seaborne fuel picks up following a drop earlier this year.】

item.title: 华尔街为何热衷于资产代币化
item.description: 加密货币是在 2008-2009 年金融危机的热浪中被发明出来的，为银行提供了一种替代选择。大约 15 年前，华尔街的许多银行和金融机构起初对被称为 "cypherpunks "的信徒们的梦想嗤之以鼻，现在它们不仅加入了加密货币行业，还开始采用底层区块链技术。【原文：Cryptocurrencies were invented in the heat of the 2008-2009 financial crisis to provide an alternative to banks. Many banks and financial institutions on Wall Street that initially scoffed at the dreams of devotees known as “cypherpunks” some 15 years ago are now not only in the cryptocurrency business, they’re also beginning to adopt the underlying blockchain technology.】

item.title: 英国通胀率低于英国央行目标，为降息提供依据
item.description: 英国通胀率三年半来首次低于英格兰银行 2% 的目标，这一下降为下月第二次降息创造了条件。【原文：UK inflation slipped below the Bank of England’s 2% target for the first time in 3 1/2 years, a fall that sets the stage for a second interest-rate cut next month.】

item.title: 投资面临挑战，PineBridge 避开印度主权债券
item.description: PineBridge 投资公司坚持其回避印度主权债券的立场，因为在当地投资面临官僚主义挑战，而且投资者偏好拉美地区较高的利差，印度主权债券今年已成为全球投资者的最爱。【原文：PineBridge Investments is sticking to its stance of avoiding Indian sovereign bonds, which have turned into a favorite pick among global investors this year, amid bureaucratic challenges of investing locally and a preference for higher carry in Latin America.】

item.title: 预算危机让法国 500 亿股票投资成为焦点
item.description: 法国亟需减少不断增加的债务，因此有人呼吁法国动用520亿欧元（570亿美元）的股票投资组合，而不是增加税收。【原文：France, which urgently needs to bring down its growing debt mountain, is facing calls to tap into the country’s €52 billion ($57 billion) stock portfolio rather than increase taxes.】

item.title: Seven & i 投资者称改革旨在抵御 Couche-Tard
item.description: 日本零售商 Seven & i 控股公司的一位股东说，该公司最近宣布的重组计划 "太少、太晚"，其目的是为了挫败 Alimentation Couche-Tard Inc.【原文：Seven & i Holdings Co.’s recently announced restructuring plan is “too little, too late” and was designed to thwart Alimentation Couche-Tard Inc.’s takeover proposal, a shareholder in the Japanese retailer said.】

item.title: 巴厘岛最大海滩俱乐部的所有者希望通过首次公开募股拓展亚洲市场
item.description: 巴厘岛占地三公顷的豪华酒店 Atlas Beach Club 的所有者 Holywings 集团正在考虑明年首次公开募股，以帮助其在亚洲扩展娱乐王国。【原文：Holywings Group, the owner of the luxurious three-hectare Atlas Beach Club in Bali, is considering an initial public offering next year to help expand its entertainment empire across Asia.】

item.title: 富时 100 指数直播：英国通胀率进一步下降，低于英国央行 2% 的预期目标
印度股市迎来四年来最大月度流出量
item.description: 海外投资者在本月的每个交易时段都抛售印度股票，使净流出量达到 2020 年 3 月以来的最高值。【原文：Overseas investors sold Indian stocks every trading session this month, taking the net outflows to the highest since March 2020.】

item.title: 石油非震荡、中国牛市和特朗普令人讨厌的关税
item.description:
他说，我们的想法是利用高贸易壁垒作为杠杆，让企业在美国建厂。【原文：

He says the idea is to use high trade barriers as leverage to get companies to build plants in the US.

】

item.title: SBB 分拆公司谨慎的老板计划放弃近期分红
item.description: 负责领导这家瑞典最大上市住宅房地产公司的高管不打算重蹈其大股东 SBB 的覆辙。【原文：The executive charged with steering the biggest listed residential property firm in Sweden is not planning to repeat the prior missteps of its majority owner, SBB.】

item.title: 香港放宽按揭规则以刺激房地产市场
item.description: 在香港房地产长期低迷的情况下，香港将放宽按揭规定，允许购房者降低首付比例。【原文：Hong Kong will relax its mortgage rules to allow lower downpayment for homebuyers amid a prolonged property slump in the city.】

item.title: 菲律宾顶级贷款机构看涨，但称降息是 "逆风
item.description: 菲律宾资产规模最大的银行--BDO Unibank Inc.公司的高层管理人员表示，尽管降息可能会挤压利润率，但该公司预计将保持创纪录的净收入。【原文：BDO Unibank Inc., the Philippines’ biggest lender by assets, expects to sustain its record net income despite “headwinds” from interest rate cuts that may squeeze margins, its top executive said.】

item.title: 住房新闻发布会前中国房地产股大涨
item.description: 由于市场猜测中国政府和央行将在定于周四举行的联合发布会上宣布促进房地产行业发展的新措施，中国房地产开发商股票大涨。【原文：Chinese property-developer stocks rallied on speculation the government and central bank will announce new measures to boost the housing sector at a joint briefing scheduled for Thursday.】

item.title: 对冲基金货币期权押注因特朗普关税风险而飙升
item.description: 对冲基金正在增加从人民币到墨西哥比索等货币的看跌头寸，以猜测唐纳德-特朗普将在下个月的美国总统大选中获胜。【原文：Hedge funds are ramping up bearish positions against currencies from the yuan to the Mexican peso to speculate that Donald Trump will win the US presidential election next month.】
